# init(_:width:)

**Initializer**

Creates an eraser tool object with the specified width.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ eraserType: PKEraserTool.EraserType, width: CGFloat)
```

## Creating an eraser tool

- **init(_:)**: Creates an eraser tool object that removes objects wholly or partially from a canvas view.
